title: Notification Settings
description: Configure how you receive stock monitoring alerts

webhook.title: Webhook Notifications
webhook.description: Receive alerts via Webhook, supports WeChat Work, DingTalk, etc.
webhook.urlHint: POST requests will be sent to this URL when alerts trigger

browserPush.title: Browser Push
browserPush.description: Receive real-time push notifications in your browser
browserPush.hint: Requires browser support and notification permission
browserPush.notSupported: Your browser doesn't support push notifications
